name: Quick Royale
description:
Welcome to Quick Royale 

A Battle royale game in BETA

I just made this game entirley for fun and i hope you guys enjoy it, Thank you for playing and check out are twitch live streams!

Cosmetics comeing out soon and plenty of new cool stuff will be released so watch out for the new stuff comeing out i hope you guys all will enjoy it because i think this game is pretty fun :))

come join are twitch:https://www.twitch.tv/dubstudios
